11.content:
Alyssa sat in the quiet library, flipping pages and keeping her face remarkably composed in spite of the less than PG book she was currently reading. She adjusted her posture and felt her foot hit something. Looking down, she saw an odd clear object, she lifted it up to her eyes and examined it. She recognized the object immediately it was a 20 sided die!

Before she could examine it further the bell rang, signalling her necessity of leaving the library. She snapped her book shut and mumbled to herself, "I wish I'd had more time to read, I was just getting to the good part!" Just then she accidentally dropped the die to the table, where it rolled a perfect 20. She looked down at the die and saw it glowed light green for just a moment!

Was it her imagination? She picked up the die again, no matter, she had to get to class. Then she noticed, no one else was getting up. No one else was even moving a muscle. Everyone else in the whole library had frozen in place. She looked down at the die in her hand and on a whim decided to test a theory,

"I wish that time would resume normally"

The die rolled onto the table and flashed teal as it landed on 15, suddenly the library came to life again as students resumed putting away their things. Alyssa followed the stream of students out into the hallway as her mind raced with what she should try next with this strange magic die.
11.title: Alyssa, the average book nerd finds the die

info.brief_description: Someone encounters a magical 20 sided die that has the power to change reality.
info.description:
HOW THE DIE WORKS:

A character makes a wish and then rolls the die

1 = Complete reversal of wish
2-19 = Wish happens with varying degrees of success, if its low the wish is weak and if it's high the wish is pretty much as described.
20 = Wish is doubled or otherwise supercharged
